channel.title: Chapter 14: Curse of Dimensionality on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 14: Curse of Dimensionality on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 14.01: Curse of Dimensionality
item.description: In this section, we discuss why our geometric intuition fails in high-dimensional spaces and introduce the phenomenon of the curse of dimensionality.

item.title: Chapter 14.02: Curse of Dimensionality - Examples
item.description: In this section, we show examples of how \(k\)-NN and the linear model suffer from the the curse of dimensionality.
